name: @okuryu/grok-js
description: Regular expression template library inspired by logstash grok filter module

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run push
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run push
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run push
scripts.push: git push origin --tags && npm run changelog && git push origin
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "Updating changelog"
scripts.test: npm run lint && nyc npm run mocha

author: Andrey Chausenko
